'''It Was Enough 10 Bodies Ago''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Prepare for Trouble]] on the island of [[Twins of Nerechtemeresch]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Hide 20 guards in the magic bushes.</big>
